text: Patent term adjustment deter-
label: BODY

text: mination.
label: BODY

text: (a) The notice of allowance will in-
label: BODY

text: clude notification of any patent term
label: BODY

text: adjustment under 35 U.S.C. 154(b).
label: BODY

text: (b) Any request for reconsideration of
label: BODY

text: the patent term adjustment indicated
label: BODY

text: in the notice of allowance, except as
label: BODY

text: provided in paragraph (d) of this sec-
label: BODY

text: tion, and any request for reinstatement
label: BODY

text: of all or part of the term reduced pur-
label: BODY

text: suant to § 1.704(b) must be by way of an
label: BODY

text: application for patent term adjust-
label: BODY

text: ment. An application for patent term
label: BODY

text: adjustment under this section must be
label: BODY

text: filed no later than the payment of the
label: BODY

text: issue fee but may not be filed earlier
label: BODY

text: than the date of mailing of the notice
label: BODY

text: of allowance. An application for patent
label: BODY

text: term adjustment under this section
label: BODY

text: must be accompanied by:
label: BODY

text: (1) The fee set forth in § 1.18(e); and
label: BODY

text: (2) A statement of the facts involved,
label: BODY

text: specifying:
label: BODY

text: (i) The correct patent term adjust-
label: BODY

text: ment and the basis or bases under
label: BODY

text: § 1.702 for the adjustment;
label: BODY

text: suant to § 1.704(b) for failing to reply to
label: BODY

text: a rejection, objection, argument, or
label: BODY

text: other request within three months of
label: BODY

text: the date of mailing of the Office com-
label: BODY

text: munication notifying the applicant of
label: BODY

text: the rejection, objection, argument, or
label: BODY

text: other request must also be accom-
label: BODY

text: panied by:
label: BODY

text: (1) The fee set forth in § 1.18(f); and
label: BODY

text: (2) A showing to the satisfaction of
label: BODY

text: the Commissioner that, in spite of all
label: BODY

text: due care, the applicant was unable to
label: BODY

text: reply to the rejection, objection, argu-
label: BODY

text: ment, or other request within three
label: BODY

text: months of the date of mailing of the
label: BODY

text: Office communication notifying the ap-
label: BODY

text: plicant of the rejection, objection, ar-
label: BODY

text: gument, or other request. The Office
label: BODY

text: shall not grant any request for rein-
label: BODY

text: statement for more than three addi-
label: BODY

text: tional months for each reply beyond
label: BODY

text: three months from the date of mailing
label: BODY

text: of the Office communication notifying
label: BODY

text: the applicant of the rejection, objec-
label: BODY

text: tion, argument, or other request.
label: BODY

text: (d) If the patent is issued on a date
label: BODY

text: other than the projected date of issue
label: BODY

text: and this change necessitates a revision
label: BODY

text: of the patent term adjustment indi-
label: BODY

text: cated in the notice of allowance, the
label: BODY

text: patent will indicate the revised patent
label: BODY

text: term adjustment. If the patent indi-
label: BODY

text: cates a revised patent term adjustment
label: BODY

text: due to the patent being issued on a
label: BODY

text: date other than the projected date of
label: BODY

text: issue, any request for reconsideration
label: BODY

text: of the patent term adjustment indi-
label: BODY

text: cated in the patent must be filed with-
label: BODY

text: in thirty days of the date the patent
label: BODY

text: issued and must comply with the re-
label: BODY

text: quirements of paragraphs (b)(1) and
label: BODY

text: (b)(2) of this section.
label: BODY

text: (e) The periods set forth in this sec-
label: BODY

text: tion are not extendable.
label: BODY

text: (f) No submission or petition on be-
label: BODY

text: half of a third party concerning patent
label: BODY

text: term adjustment under 35 U.S.C. 154(b)
label: BODY

text: will be considered by the Office. Any
label: BODY

text: such submission or petition will be re-
label: BODY

text: turned to the third party, or otherwise
label: BODY

text: disposed of, at the convenience of the

text: EXTENSION OF PATENT TERM DUE TO
label: BODY

text: REGULATORY REVIEW
label: BODY

text: Patents subject to extension of
label: BODY

text: the patent term.
label: BODY

text: (a) A patent is eligible for extension
label: BODY

text: of the patent term if the patent claims
label: BODY

text: a product as defined in paragraph (b) of
label: BODY

text: this section, either alone or in com-
label: BODY

text: bination with other ingredients that
label: BODY

text: read on a composition that received
label: BODY

text: permission for commercial marketing
label: BODY

text: or use, or a method of using such a
label: BODY

text: product, or a method of manufacturing
label: BODY

text: such a product, and meets all other
label: BODY

text: conditions and requirements of this
label: BODY

text: subpart.
label: BODY

text: (b) The term product referred to in
label: BODY

text: paragraph (a) of this section means—
label: BODY

text: (1) The active ingredient of a new
label: BODY

text: human drug, antibiotic drug, or human
label: BODY

text: biological product (as those terms are
label: BODY

text: used in the Federal Food, Drug, and
label: BODY

text: Cosmetic Act and the Public Health
label: BODY

text: Service Act) including any salt or ester
label: BODY

text: of the active ingredient, as a single en-
label: BODY

text: tity or in combination with another ac-
label: BODY

text: tive ingredient; or
label: BODY

text: (2) The active ingredient of a new
label: BODY

text: animal drug or veterinary biological
label: BODY

text: product (as those terms are used in the
label: BODY

text: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act
label: BODY

text: and the Virus-Serum-Toxin Act) that is
label: BODY

text: not primarily manufactured using re-
label: BODY

text: combinant DNA, recombinant RNA,
label: BODY

text: hybridoma technology, or other proc-
label: BODY

text: esses including site specific genetic
label: BODY

text: manipulation
label: BODY

text: techniques,
label: BODY

text: including
